projects.name: Vue Zephyrs
description: Vue Zephyrs is a flexible component library.
Out-of-the-box, Vue Zephyrs uses Tailwind CSS, however in the future you will be able to bring your own CSS framework.
Note: This project is currently in early Alpha.

projects.name: Proper
description: Proper is a bash script builder to help automate the installation and updating process for Mac's dependencies.
Proper is built using Next.js and deployed on Netlify.

projects.name: Press CSS
description: Press CSS is an internal design system and CSS framework built for Frontiers USA.
Press CSS is built on top of a modified config of Tailwind CSS.
